# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#21)

#### Day 21

*And you don't feel a small measure of pride?*
Egwene asked herself.
*Rand al'Thor, once simple village boy and your near-betrothed, now the most powerful man in the world? You don't feel proud of what he's done?*
(p. 157)
